name: Seamount
description: An underwater mountain that doesn't reach the surface creates unique marine ecosystems and potential sources of valuable minerals. The underwater location creates unique exploration challenges, while the isolated nature can preserve unique ecosystems or ancient secrets.
atmosphere: Underwater mountain rises from abyssal depths while currents create swirling turbulence around the hidden summit. Marine life clusters in colorful abundance on nutrient-rich slopes as the crushing depth creates an alien world. Cold water carries deep ocean mysteries. Navigation hazard for surface vessels.
